title: Spaced Repetition Microlearning Program for Enhancing Feedback Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic feedback experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Program focused on acquiring feedback techniques applicable to language education settings for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three feedback techniques effectively applicable in language education contexts
Learners can apply observation-based assessment techniques in practical settings to produce one specific feedback statement for a learner
Learners can recognize five core principles of feedback and develop actionable plans for implementation in educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
